title: Study on the effect of different contact times on the migration of heavy metals into different foodstuffs served in plastic cups
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): B.M. Khaled, Adda Ann Sina, Md. Suman Rana, S. M. Shamiul Alam, Abdullah Al Numan, Maria Tabassum Shammi, Fatima Parvin, Tamanna Naznin, Md. Mozaffor Hossain, Refat Pervin Annana
